name: Asteroids Exploder
description:
This game is made in 1 day using unity.

So if you see any bugs you can report it to Mohammad.front.dev@gmail.com.

--------------------------------------------------

Recipe:

1. Avoid asteroids

2. Either explode them with bullets or explode explosions to keep them away(You have to find the key corresponding to explosions, you only have 3 explosions too)

3. It is possible that you run out of bullets, so be careful!

4. Reach 2000 Score
